guidetextdraw.name: headerText

guideContainer.name: guide1
guideContainer.thankYouMessage: Thank you for submitting the form.

guidedropdownlist.name: dropdownlist1482147617734
guidedropdownlist.options: [0=CBP FOIA Division,1=Defense Logistics Agency,2=Department of Defense Office of Inspector General,3=Department of Justice - Office of Information Policy,4=Department of the Navy,5=Environmental Protection Agency]

fd:rules.fd:enabled: [{"nodeName":"ROOT"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"STATEMENT"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"DISABLE_EXPRESSION"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"AFCOMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"guide.guideRootPanel.foiaApplication.filledByApplicant.requestDate"\,"type":"FIELD"\,"name":"requestDate"}}\,{"nodeName":"When"\,"value":null}\,{"nodeName":"CONDITIONORALWAYS"\,"choice":null}\,{"nodeName":"Else"\,"value":null}\,{"nodeName":"DONOTHING_OR_ENABLE"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"Enable"\,"value":null}}]}}]\,"isValid":true\,"enabled":true\,"version":1\,"script":"/**\\n\\n * This is a machine-generated code for the rule.\\n * If you modify it in the code editor\, you will not be able to view and edit the rule in the visual editor.\\n */\\n\\nfalse;\\n\\n"\,"eventName":"Enabled"}]

requestorName.jcr:title: Requestor name
requestorName.mandatoryMessage: Please enter the name of the requestor.
requestorName.name: requestorName

guidenumericbox.jcr:title: Will Pay Up To :
guidenumericbox.longDescription: This is not a prescribed amount but rather an administration fee which is used to collate and make physical copies of the information requested.
guidenumericbox.name: payment

requestInDetail.jcr:title: Describe the request in detail
requestInDetail.mandatoryMessage: Please describe your Freedom of Information Act request in detail.
requestInDetail.name: requestInDetail
requestInDetail.placeholderText: Use this space to provide the additional information within this request.

guideradiobutton.jcr:title: Request a Fee Waiver
guideradiobutton.longDescription: Requester may request that all fees associated with the request be waived.
guideradiobutton.name: feeWaiver

fd:rules.fd:visible: [{"nodeName":"ROOT"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"STATEMENT"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"SHOW_EXPRESSION"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"AFCOMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"guide.guideRootPanel.foiaApplication.filledByApplicant.feeWaiver_Details"\,"type":"AFCOMPONENT"\,"name":"feeWaiver_Details"}}\,{"nodeName":"When"\,"value":null}\,{"nodeName":"CONDITIONORALWAYS"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"COMPARISON_EXPRESSION"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"EXPRESSION"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"COMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"guide.guideRootPanel.foiaApplication.filledByApplicant.feeWaiver"\,"displayName":"Request a Fee Waiver"\,"type":"STRING"\,"displayPath":"FORM/Root Panel/FOIA Application/To Be Filled By Applicant/Request a Fee Waiver/"\,"name":"feeWaiver"\,"parent":"guide.guideRootPanel.foiaApplication.filledByApplicant"}}}\,{"nodeName":"OPERATOR"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"EQUALS_TO"\,"value":null}}\,{"nodeName":"EXPRESSION"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"STRING_LITERAL"\,"value":"Yes"}}]}}\,{"nodeName":"Else"\,"value":null}\,{"nodeName":"DONOTHING_OR_HIDE"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"Hide"\,"value":null}}]}}]\,"isValid":true\,"enabled":true\,"version":1\,"script":"/**\\n\\n * This is a machine-generated code for the rule.\\n * If you modify it in the code editor\, you will not be able to view and edit the rule in the visual editor.\\n */\\n\\nif (feeWaiver.value == \\"Yes\\") {\\n true;\\n } else {\\n false;\\n}\\n"\,"eventName":"Visibility"}]

guideradiobutton_950647202.jcr:title: Request Expedited Processing
guideradiobutton_950647202.longDescription: Requestor may ask for processing on an expedited basis
guideradiobutton_950647202.name: expeditedProcess

fd:rules.fd:visible: [{"nodeName":"ROOT"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"STATEMENT"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"SHOW_EXPRESSION"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"AFCOMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"guide.guideRootPanel.foiaApplication.filledByApplicant.expeditedProcess_Details"\,"type":"AFCOMPONENT"\,"name":"expeditedProcess_Details"}}\,{"nodeName":"When"\,"value":null}\,{"nodeName":"CONDITIONORALWAYS"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"COMPARISON_EXPRESSION"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"EXPRESSION"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"COMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"guide.guideRootPanel.foiaApplication.filledByApplicant.expeditedProcess"\,"displayName":"Request Expedited Processing"\,"type":"STRING"\,"displayPath":"FORM/Root Panel/FOIA Application/To Be Filled By Applicant/Request Expedited Processing/"\,"name":"expeditedProcess"\,"parent":"guide.guideRootPanel.foiaApplication.filledByApplicant"}}}\,{"nodeName":"OPERATOR"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"EQUALS_TO"\,"value":null}}\,{"nodeName":"EXPRESSION"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"STRING_LITERAL"\,"value":"Yes"}}]}}\,{"nodeName":"Else"\,"value":null}\,{"nodeName":"DONOTHING_OR_HIDE"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"Hide"\,"value":null}}]}}]\,"isValid":true\,"enabled":true\,"version":1\,"script":"/**\\n\\n * This is a machine-generated code for the rule.\\n * If you modify it in the code editor\, you will not be able to view and edit the rule in the visual editor.\\n */\\n\\nif (expeditedProcess.value == \\"Yes\\") {\\n true;\\n } else {\\n false;\\n}\\n"\,"eventName":"Visibility"}]

contactMediumPreference.jcr:title: How would you like us to contact you?
contactMediumPreference.mandatoryMessage: Please select your preferred contact medium.
contactMediumPreference.name: contactMediumPreference

contactDatePreference.jcr:title: Date by which information is required?
contactDatePreference.mandatoryMessage: Please select your preferred date of contact.
contactDatePreference.name: contactDatePreference

requestID.name: requestID

disclaimerText.value: This document is strictly private, confidential and personal to its recipients and should not be copied, distributed or reproduced in whole or in part, nor passed to any third party.
